Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION Management of TYPE 2 Slowly Changing Dimensions on Teradata (v2r5.0 or later). Data can be controlled. Invalid data is isolated in the Error Table and can be recycled.
REQUIREMENTS Mapping needs to have a defined update key Target table need to be configured for slowly changing dimension behaviour. See BASIC CONFIGURATION for more details. All target table columns flagged as: "Surrogate Key", "Natural Key", "Current Record Flag", "Start Timestamp" and "End Timestamp" need to be mapped. Notice that mappings set for the "Current Record Flag", "Start Timestamp" and "End Timestamp" columns are ignored.
BASIC CONFIGURATION - When defining the Target Datastore, it is necessary to set the following parameters (from the "Slowly Changing Dimensions Behavior" list box, on the "Description" tab of each column concerned): - Surrogate Key: A single column identifying Records. This column must be defined as an Identity column on the Target Data Server and should be: - Mapped to 0 (zero), - Executed on Target - Natural Key: Column(s) representing the Natural Key of the Record. - Overwrite Column: List of updatable column(s) (i.e. those that can be updated after modification of the original data). - Insert Row: List of column(s) representing the Slowly Changing Attributes (i.e. those that require a Record insert after modification of the original data) - Current Record Flag: A single numeric column mapped to 0 or 1 and representing the Current Record Flag status of the Record. It is automatically updated by the Knowledge Module (1 : Current Record ; 0 : Past Records) - Start Timestamp: A single date (or timestamp) column indicating the beginning of a Record's availability. The value is the current date (or timestamp). - End Timestamp: A single date (or timestamp) column indicating the end of the Record's availability. The value is a default of "01 January 2400"
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - COMMIT: Commit target transaction at the end of mapping? - FLOW_CONTROL: Validate incoming data by a CKM? - RECYCLE_ERRORS: Recycle rejects from previous run? - STATIC_CONTROL: Validate data once loaded into target? - PRIMARY_INDEX: Specify primary index to be used on flow/ target table - DELETE_ALL: Delete all from target before loading? - VALIDATE: Validate KM options? - CREATE_TARG_TABLE: Create target table? - DELETE_TEMPORARY_OBJECTS: Drop ODI intermediate tables after load? - FLOW_TABLE_OPTIONS: DDL options for creating flow table - FLOW_TABLE_TYPE: Use set or multiset table for flow table? - COLLECT_STATS: Collect statistics on flow and target table? - ODI_DDL: Specify, what DDL to be generated?
LIMITATIONS - As this Knowledge Module is dedicated to Datawarehouse Projects (where data should not be removed), when using it with a journalized Source Datastore, it is not possible to synchronize deletions. Therefore, data should be manually filtered to exclude any source delete events (add a filter on JRN_FLAG = 'I'). - Deletes are committed regardless of the COMMIT option. - The FLOW_CONTROL and STATIC_CONTROL options call the Check Knowledge Module to isolate invalid data (if no CKM is set, an error occurs). Both options must be set to NO in the case when an Integration mapping populates a TEMPORARY target datastore. If the Table Primary Key is designated by the same column as the Surrogate Key, then: 1. Uncheck the "Check Not Null" checkbox for the column representing the Primary Key. 2. Set the option value to NO for the Primary Key control. - When COMMIT=NO, last drop flow statement issues warning, as table is still locked by pending transaction. - Temporary Indexes: HASH index may only be used on Teradata source tables with no identify column in PI definition (Teradata RDBMS restriction)
Commit all data inserted in the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to perform flow control.
Check this option to recycle data rejected by flow control in a previous execution of this interface.
Check this option to control the target table after having inserted or updated target data.

Specify primary index for flow table. Teradata uses the PI to spread data accross AMPs. It is important that the chosen PI has a high cardinality (many distint values) to ensure evenly spread data to allow maximum processing performance. Pleaes follow Teradata's recommandation on choosing a primary index, e.g. Teradata Database Design, Chapter "Primary Indexes" Valid options are [PK] Primary key of target table [UK] Update key set in interface [SCD_NK] SCD Natural key of target <list of cols> This comma separated list of target columns defines the primary index. If no value is set (empty), no index will be created. NB: Teradata will automatically choose the first column of the table for the PI.
Check this option if you wish to delete all the rows of the target datastore.

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - Validation of ODI_DLL option
This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.
Check this option if you wish to create the target table
Set this option to NO if you wish to retain temporary objects (tables, files and scripts) after integration. Useful for debugging.
no fallback, no before journal, no after journal
Additional options for the temporary I$ table. See documentation for valid values: - [NO] FALLBACK - [NO | DUAL] [BEFORE | AFTER] JOURNAL etc.
Collect stats on flow and target?
Collect statistics on primary index of flow and target table?

Specify handling of temporary tables with the following values: - DROP_CREATE: Always drop and recreate all temporary tables for every execution (default behaviour). - CREATE_DELETE_ALL: Create temporary tables when needed (usually for the first execution only) and use DELETE ALL to drop the temporary table content. Temporary table are reused for subsequent executions. - DELETE_ALL: Do not create temporary tables. Only submit DELETE ALL for all temporary tables. - NONE: Do not issue any DDL on temporary tables. Temporary tables should be handled separately.
This option generates an extra validation step. This step check that at least one column is marked as SCD_ADD and at least another one marked as SCD_UPD.

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> ( <%if (!(odiRef.getColList("", "[EXPRESSION]", "", "", "((SCD_SK and TRG) and REW)").equals("0"))){out.print(odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", ",", "((SCD_SK and TRG) and REW)"));}%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_FLAG and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> ) select <%if (!(odiRef.getColList("", "[EXPRESSION]", "", "", "((SCD_SK and TRG) and REW)").equals("0"))){out.print(odiRef.getColList("", "	[EXPRESSION]", "", ",", "((SCD_SK and TRG) and REW)"));}%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[EXPRESSION]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "1", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_FLAG AND REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> as S where S.IND_UPDATE = 'I'

update T from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> as T, <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> as S set <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]	= '0'", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_FLAG and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]	= ", "", "", "(SCD_END and REW)")%><%=odiRef.getColList("", "S.[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]	= S.[COL_NAME]", "
and	", "", "(SCD_NK)")%> and <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]	= 1", "
and	", "", "(SCD_FLAG)")%> and S.IND_UPDATE = 'I'

<% if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").length() > 0) { %>
collect stats using sample on  <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> <% 
      /* update key used for PI ? */
      if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[UK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("column (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "UK") );
      /* use primary key for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[PK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("column (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "PK") );
      /* use natural key for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[SCD_NK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("column (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "SCD_NK") );
      /* use column list for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").length() > 0) 
          out.print( "column (" + odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX") + ")" );
%> 
<%} else { %>
-- No stats, as no PRIMARY_INDEX was specified
<%};%>

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","JRN_NAME","A")%> where JRN_CONSUMED = '1' <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "DROP" )>-1) { %>
locking table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> for exclusive nowait drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%>
<%} else {%> -- Disabled by ODI_DDL option <%}%>

<% /* DDL disabled? */
if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "CREATE" )< 0) { 
%>-- Disabled by ODI_DDL option

<% } /* Primary index ? */ else 
if  ("UPI".equalsIgnoreCase(odiRef.getTemporaryIndex("INDEX_TYPE_CODE")) || "NUPI".equalsIgnoreCase(odiRef.getTemporaryIndex("INDEX_TYPE_CODE"))) {
%>Primary index of existing table cannot be dropped. Please select different index type.

<% /* Hash index ? */ } else 
if ( "HASH".equalsIgnoreCase(odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("INDEX_TYPE_CLAUSE")) ) { 
%>drop hash index <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L",odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("IDX_NAME"),"W") %>

<% /* Other index type */ } else { 
%>drop <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("INDEX_TYPE_CLAUSE") %> index <%=odiRef.getObjectShortName("L",odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("IDX_NAME"),"W") %> on <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>

<%};%>

<% /* DDL disabled? */ if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "CREATE" )< 0) { %>-- Disabled by ODI_DDL option
<% } /* [non] unique primary index ? */ else if ("UPI".equalsIgnoreCase(odiRef.getTemporaryIndex("INDEX_TYPE_CODE")) || "NUPI".equalsIgnoreCase(odiRef.getTemporaryIndex("INDEX_TYPE_CODE"))) { %>Primary index of existing table cannot be changed. Please select different index type.
<% /* Hash index ? */ } else if ( "HASH".equalsIgnoreCase(odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("INDEX_TYPE_CLAUSE")) ) { %>Create <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("INDEX_TYPE_CLAUSE") %> Index <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L",odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("IDX_NAME"),"W") %> <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndexColList( "(", " [COL_NAME] ", ", ", ")" )%> on <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>
<% /* Other index type */ } else { %>Create <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("INDEX_TYPE_CLAUSE") %> Index <%=odiRef.getObjectShortName("L",odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("IDX_NAME"),"W") %> <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndexColList( "(", " [COL_NAME] ", ", ", ")" )%> on <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>
<%};%>

<%
       if (odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "(((SCD_UPD) ) and MAP)").length() == 0) {
          odiRef.getLogger().log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE,  "ODIKM-STDKM-IKM-10006", "Target Table must have at least one column mapped as Update on change" );
          out.print( "Target Table must have at least one column mapped as 'Update on change' " );
       }
%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "CREATE" )>-1) { %>

create <%=odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_TYPE")%> table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%>,
	<%=odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_OPTIONS")%>

(
	<%=odiRef.getTargetColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_CRE_DT] " + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"),",\n\t", "")%>
)
<% /* use update key for PI ? */
      if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[UK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("primary index (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "UK") );
      /* use primary key for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[PK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("unique primary index (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "PK") );
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[SCD_NK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("primary index (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "SCD_NK") );
      /* use column list for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").length() > 0) 
          out.print( "primary index (" + odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX") + ")" );
%>

<%} else {%>
-- Disabled by ODI_DDL option
<%}%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "CREATE" )>-1) { %>

create <%=odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_TYPE")%> table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%>,
	<%=odiRef.getOption("FLOW_TABLE_OPTIONS")%>
(
	<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] null", ",\n\t", ",", "")%>
	IND_UPDATE		CHAR(1)
)
<% /* use update key for PI ? */
      if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[UK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("primary index (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "UK") );
      /* use primary key for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[PK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("primary index (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "PK") );
      /* use target's natural key for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[SCD_NK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("primary index (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "SCD_NK") );
      /* use column list for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").length() > 0) 
          out.print( "primary index (" + odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX") + ")" );
%>

<%} else {%>
-- Disabled by ODI_DDL option
<%}%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "DELETE_ALL" )>-1) { %>
delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> all
<%} else {%> -- Disabled by ODI_DDL option <%}%>

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package. No operation here */ <% } else { %> update <%=odiRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%> set JRN_CONSUMED = '1' where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

<% /* DDL disabled? */
if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "CREATE" )< 0) { 
%>-- Disabled by ODI_DDL option

<% } /* Primary index ? */ else 
if  ("UPI".equalsIgnoreCase(odiRef.getTemporaryIndex("INDEX_TYPE_CODE")) || "NUPI".equalsIgnoreCase(odiRef.getTemporaryIndex("INDEX_TYPE_CODE"))) {
%>Primary index of existing table cannot be dropped. Please select different index type.

<% /* Hash index ? */ } else 
if ( "HASH".equalsIgnoreCase(odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("INDEX_TYPE_CLAUSE")) ) { 
%>drop hash index <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L",odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("IDX_NAME"),"W") %>

<% /* Other index type */ } else { 
%>drop <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("INDEX_TYPE_CLAUSE") %> index <%=odiRef.getObjectShortName("L",odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("IDX_NAME"),"W") %> on <%=odiRef.getTemporaryIndex ("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>

<%};%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "DROP" )>-1) { %>
drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%>
<%} else {%> -- Disabled by ODI_DDL option <%}%>

update T from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> as T, <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> as S set <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]	= S.[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(((SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]	= [EXPRESSION]", ",
	", "", "(((SCD_UPD) and TRG) and REW)")%> where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]	= S.[COL_NAME]", "
and	", "", "SCD_NK")%> and <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]	= 1", "
and	", "", "SCD_FLAG")%> and S.IND_UPDATE = 'U'

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> IND_UPDATE ) <%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i, "", "[EXPRESSION]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i, "", "[EXPRESSION]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i, "", "cast('2400-01-01' as [DEST_WRI_DT] format 'YYYY-MM-DD')", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> <%if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) {%> JRN_FLAG IND_UPDATE <%}else{%> 'I' IND_UPDATE <%}%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> <% {s="where (1=1)"; s+=(char)10+odiRef.getJoin(i); s+=(char)10+odiRef.getFilter(i); s+=(char)10+odiRef.getJrnFilter(i); /* For Performance: suppress where clause, if empty */ if (!s.trim().equals("where (1=1)")) {out.print(s);}; };%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> except select <%=odiRef.getColList(i, "", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i, "", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i, "", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> 'I' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> where <%=odiRef.getColList(i, "","[COL_NAME]	= 1","
and	","","SCD_FLAG")%> <%}%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").length() > 0) { %>
collect stats using sample on  <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> <% 
      /* update key used for PI ? */
      if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[UK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("column (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "UK") );
      /* primary key used for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[PK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("column (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "PK") );
      /* target's natural key used for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[SCD_NK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("column (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "SCD_NK") );
      /* column list used for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").length() > 0) 
          out.print( "column (" + odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX") + ")" );
	} else { %>
-- No stats, as no PRIMARY_INDEX specified or COLLECT_STATS disabled.
<%};%>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> IND_UPDATE ) select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> 'I' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> as E where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> as T where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]	= E.[COL_NAME]", "
		and	", "", "SCD_NK")%>) and E.ODI_ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>' and E.ODI_ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>'

update S from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> as S, <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> as T set IND_UPDATE = 'U' where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "S.[COL_NAME]\t= T.[COL_NAME]", " and ", "", "SCD_NK")%> and <%=odiRef.getColList("", "((S.[COL_NAME] = T.[COL_NAME]) or ((S.[COL_NAME] is null) and (T.[COL_NAME] is null)))", "\nand\t", "", "SCD_INS and !TRG")%> and <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]\t= 1", "\n\t\tand\t", "", "SCD_FLAG")%>

<%
       if (odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "(((SCD_INS) ) and MAP)").length() == 0) {
          odiRef.getLogger().log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE,  "ODIKM-STDKM-IKM-10007", "Target Table must have at least one column mapped as Insert on change" );
          out.print( "Target Table must have at least one column mapped as 'Insert on change' " );
       }
%>
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Commit transaction
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Collect stats on target table
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Post-integration control
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Drop flow table
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Validate KM options
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Check updated columns
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Create target table
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Delete target table
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Collect stats on flow table
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Recycle previous errors
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Flow control
DEMO.IKM Teradata Slowly Changing Dimension.Check inserted columns
